definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian sparrowhawk (Accipiter nisus)
(bird species of China) Japanese sparrowhawk (Accipiter gularis)

sentences.english: When a hunting sparrowhawk 'locks on' to a target there is no turning back.
sentences.chinese: 當雀鷹‘鎖定’一個目標後，它從來沒有反悔過。

sentences.english: Sparrowhawks pounce on their prey by accelerating over short distances.
sentences.chinese: 雀鷹能在超短距離通過加速來衝向它的獵物。
